ccu-value.tip:
Omit Interface, Channel and/or Datapoint if you want to supply them via msg.interface, msg.channel und msg.datapoint. Alternatively you can supply all 3 via msg.topic (seperated through dots) e.g. {"topic": "BidCos-RF.Licht Badezimmer:1.LEVEL", "payload": 0.7}.
Mind that this node only emits messages if Interface, Channel und Datapoint are set. To receive events from multiple actuators please use the "rpc event" node.
